name: SprintForge Agent Hook
description: Listens for file changes and automatically triggers Kiro to take follow-up actions for SprintForge development

actions.prompt: A file has been modified in the SprintForge codebase. Please review the changes and update relevant documentation files if needed. Focus on API documentation, component documentation, and README updates.
Code changes detected in SprintForge. Please review for performance optimizations, security improvements, and code quality enhancements. Run type checking and suggest improvements.
New UI components or text content detected. Please check if internationalization support is needed and update language files accordingly for SprintForge's multi-language support.
